item.title: Hello world!
item.description: R Markdown This website has been built using the below sources: 1. http://www.storybench.org/how-to-build-a-website-with-blogdown-in-r/ 2. https://amber.rbind.io/2016/12/19/website/ 3. https://www.hjdskes.nl/blog/deploying-hugo-on-personal-gh-pages/index.html 4. https://jdeines.github.io/post/r-blogdown-hugo-and-github-website/ 5. https://alison.rbind.io/post/up-and-running-with-blogdown/#read-up-on-blogdown Related: https://mltconsecol.github.io/post/20170123_blogdown_hugo/
